pricing.modelCosts: Tasks cost pennies to run for smaller, everyday tasks, and dollars for large test suites

features: No licensing costs the first year
enterprise.afterFirstYear: After the first year, licensing is negotiated based on team size and usage. AI model costs apply from day one.

nonEnterprise.description: No licensing fees ever. You only pay for the AI model usage - pennies for simple tasks, dollars for large batches.
nonEnterprise.descriptionProfessionals: Perfect for freelancers and individual contributors. No licensing fees - just pay for AI model usage as you go.
